text: The Adventure Shop is a 1919 American silent adventure film directed by Kenneth S. Webb and starring Corinne Griffith, Walter McGrail and Robert Gaillard.Koszarski p.108 ==Cast== * Corinne Griffith as Phyllis Blake * Walter McGrail as Josephus Potts, Jr * Warren Chandler as Josephus Potts * Priestly Morrison as John Montgomery * Robert Gaillard as Franklin Herbert ==References== ==Bibliography== * Koszarski, Richard. Hollywood on the Hudson: Film and Television in New York from Griffith to Sarnoff. Rutgers University Press, 2008. ==External links== * Category:1919 films Category:1919 adventure films Category:American films Category:American adventure films Category:Films directed by Kenneth Webb Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Vitagraph Studios films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Adventure Shop
